name: Leg Press
description: Strengthens quadriceps, glutes and hamstrings with controlled lower-body pushing movements.

name: Chest Press
description: Targets the pectorals, triceps and front deltoids with guided pushing motions.

name: Lat Pulldown
description: Develops upper back muscles by pulling a weighted bar downward.

name: Smith Machine
description: Assisted barbell system that improves stability for squats, presses and rows.

name: Cable Crossover
description: Versatile cable system for chest, shoulders and arms using adjustable pulleys.

name: Leg Curl
description: Isolates the hamstrings with knee-flexion movements.

name: Leg Extension
description: Isolates the quadriceps through controlled leg extensions.

name: Seated Row Machine
description: Strengthens mid-back and rear deltoids with horizontal pulling.

name: Treadmill
description: Cardio machine for running or walking with variable speed and incline.

name: Elliptical Trainer
description: Low-impact cardio machine engaging upper and lower body.

name: Stationary Bike
description: Indoor cycling for endurance and leg strength.

name: Pec Deck
description: Chest-focused machine using fly movements for pectoral isolation.

name: Hack Squat Machine
description: Guided squat platform that targets quads and glutes with added stability.

name: Shoulder Press Machine
description: Trains deltoids and triceps with overhead pushing movements.

name: Ab Crunch Machine
description: Isolates abdominal muscles using a guided crunch mechanism.
